summary: Frontend testing of Camp Baraisa updates - Login page Utah logo (w-72 h-72 = 288x288px), full motto, Campers page Contact column with Call/Text/Email buttons, Billing page Charge button with Stripe dialog showing 3.5% fee breakdown, Create Invoice dialog with camper selection dropdown. All features working correctly.
seed_data_creation: Used existing test campers and invoices
context_for_next_testing_agent: All requested features verified working: 1) Utah logo is 288x288px (w-72 h-72), 2) Full motto displayed on login page, 3) Contact column with Call/Text/Email buttons on Campers page, 4) Charge button in Billing page Actions column, 5) Stripe dialog shows 3.5% fee breakdown, 6) Create Invoice dialog camper selection dropdown works

login_page.utah_logo_size: PASS - Logo is 288x288px (w-72 h-72 class applied)
login_page.motto_line_1: PASS - 'The Ultimate Bein Hazmanim Experience' displayed
login_page.motto_line_2: PASS - 'for the serious Ben Torah' displayed in orange
